answers.answer: I don't know what caused your bronchitis, but if you take 500 mg. of vitamin B5 daily, your bronchitis will be eased. It has the effect of liquifying phlegm. There ae no side effects. I have used this for about four months and my condition is very much improved. B5 is also used successfully for infectious bronchitis.

question: I have been diagnosed with chronic bronchitis.  I quit smoking 40 yrs ago.   A test showed  that my lungs are clear.  I have diabetes 2.  Do you think this could have caused the bronchitis.?  I have gotten a lot of things happening since I was found to have diabetes.  I was also exposed to agent orange.  Any help would be appreciated.Thanks,Tdog
title: bronchitis cause
